\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage[math,plot,tikz]{forsyde}
\tikzset{
  diagonal fill/.style 2 args={fill=#2, path picture={
      \fill[#1, sharp corners] (path picture bounding box.south west) -| (path picture bounding box.north east) -- cycle;
    }},
  reversed diagonal fill/.style 2 args={fill=#2, path picture={
      \fill[#1, sharp corners] (path picture bounding box.north west) |- (path picture bounding box.south east) -- cycle;}}
}

  f={$\noexpand\mathit{solver}$}] (ns) {$\MocCmb$};
  \basic[primitive,f={$t \mapsto 0$},

  \interface[at={ns.205}, xshift=-1.3cm] (ct2sy) {ct}{sy};
  \interface[right of=ns] (sy2ct) {sy}{ct};

  \draw[s=sy,->,srcport] (ct2sy) -- (ns.205);
  \draw[s=sy,->,srcport] (ct2sy) -- ++(0,-.6) coordinate (b) -| (ns);

  \node[anchor=north west] at (b) {\scriptsize \texttt{timestamps}};
